name: ORDER_RES_3
description: The ORDER_RES_3 table contains result finding information for an order. Result findings include mammography pathology results, cardiovascular palette findings, and other result findings.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LUNG_SEC_HIST_C_NAME
columns.description: Determines the type of cancer that was found in the secondary cell type of the tissue sample.

columns.name: LUNG_SEC_NONSMALL_C_NAME
columns.description: If secondary histology is "Non Small Cell Lung Cancer", then this item specifies the type of the cancer.

columns.name: LUNG_SEC_NS_COMM
columns.description: If Secondary histology - Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer is Other, Specify, then this item holds a free text description of the cancer.

columns.name: FIRST_DOCUMENTED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when this lesion was first documented.
